alert.note: Alert for Manatee; Sarasota (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 31 at 7:34PM EDT until May 31 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Ruskin has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Manatee County in west central Florida... Northwestern Sarasota County in west central Florida... * Until 800 PM EDT. * At 734 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over West Samoset, or near Bradenton, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sarasota, Bradenton, Palmetto, Bradenton Beach, Bayshore Gardens, Lakewood Ranch, Cortez, Ellenton, Whitney Beach and Samoset. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
